articles.author: Claire Parker, Lior Soroka, Shira Rubin, Mohamad El Chamaa
articles.title: Israel prepares to receive American hostage Edan Alexander from Hamas - The Washington Post
articles.description: Hamas agreed to release Alexander, the last living U.S. hostage in Gaza, after talks with the Trump administration. His parents traveled to Israel from New Jersey.
articles.content: JERUSALEM Israel is preparing to receive Israeli American hostage Edan Alexander from captivity in Gaza after Hamas said late Sunday that it would release the 21-year-old unconditionally following di… [+7978 chars]

articles.author: Joe Hernandez
articles.title: Here's what U.S. Catholics are saying about the election of Pope Leo XIV - NPR
articles.description: At services on Sunday, some Catholics took particular pride in the election of the first American pontiff, who has familial ties to multiple places across the country.
articles.content:
When Catholics across the U.S. attended Sunday services this weekend, it was the first time in history they had done so with an American pope sitting in the Vatican.
